channel.title: Pages on Yale Undergraduate Quantum Computing
channel.description: Recent content in Pages on Yale Undergraduate Quantum Computing

item.title: About
item.description: Purpose We are an undergraduate organization formed to promote and facilitate the exploration of quantum information science at Yale. Activites Networking, Resources, Projects, Events. (Depending on member interests.) Develop open Source Quantum Computing Club Projects Develop Tutorials concepts: LinAlg, QM, Quantum Error Correction, etc tools: Qiskit, Cirq, Pennylane, etc Host Tours of Industry Quantum Computing Labs Attend and possibly host QC Hackathons Build an Alumni Network Build Graduate Student Mentorship Program Host research talks from academics, industry professionals, and club members Host Literature Review Discussions Facilitate Outreach to HS Students Membership Membership form: https://forms.
